Blog.post: Construction is underway on my new ammo can pc... Pics are on my website which can be found at www.geocities.com/chillis33 This will be a tight computer when its completed.

Just got back from paintballing.... one word, pwnage. (that'd be me) We played the castle map at Fun on the Run in Lake Worth. First round was pretty lame. At first we guarded the castle and I got out within 5 minutes of the match... But when the tables turned I was storming the castle covert from the side with some friends I met there from school. When it came down to about 2 minutes I stormed the back entrance and hid in the moat for about a minute, but when the ref called 30 seconds i just ran thru the door, getting shot every which way. People who were already out said I looked like I was in the Matrix. Pretty 1337. got shot 8 times all over. We didn't win the match, but we had fun anyways.

Just got back from the football game at the high school. Of course we lost, we usually do. I think the score was some where along the lines of 40 to 6 but thats not important... we still lost. Just sitting here relaxing to the nice sound of Cheap Trick on my stereo... but thats another story. Sometime I have to force myself to go to either Hot Topic or Pacific Sunware to get a new hackysack, the one I have is too small. Got the go ahead on the blogger hoodie. Look for me in it when it ships.

The new blog is up. I was sick and tired of trying to get Movable Type to work, so I just gave in and created one with blogger... You know what? I'm really liking that Blogger Hoodie... might end up buying it.

happy halloween everybody, my favorite day of the year.. not really, worley is having a lan party tonight so i might go and take me server over to play some gamez on his cable.. itd be me, nick, d, sam, and worley, fragging it up in ET. on a lighter note we have no teacher today in programming. ah nice we have a free day to do nothing but surf the internet and play java gamez. fun eh? got to get back to me pitfall :) [c]

hah, i have finally cracked that stupid st bernard thing, also got past bess. the only way i am blogging this right now is because i have found a transparent proxy... now th bell is about to ring once i cracked it. how stupid. i hope the admins dont find this proxy out.. its the only one i have found to work [c]

i got nothing, bored... fixing to go to my brother football game.. cant you tell im thrilled? trying to set up a webserver for me blog... then it will be easier for me to update on account of st bernard wont let me get to blogger from school... i will continue to work on it.. then my blogging will increase daily [c]
got me urlLink Blogger Hoodie today.. maybe its time you got yours? [c]
i think ill apply for a job at M$ and then move to redmond... what do you think [c]

just got back from TS2. a little program MS puts on for free, got some cool freebie stuff, like windows server 2003 [NFR, of course] and a lot of good information... hoping once i get my laptop that i can put office 2003 pro on there with the new infopath and one note. nice little apps fer school and stuff... anyways i have to write an essay on women's roles in today's professions which is due tomorrow so i am going to start on that. [c]

can you believe the one day i order my hoodie googlestore's website was screwed up? i called them and thats what they told me. so anyways ill "have it within 3-5 days" and plus they are not charging me for shipping... schweet. saved 6 bucks. very nice. anyways i got to go and get ready for church. might blog from there later if anything exciting happens. [c]

so much work, so much money. rollin in the dough, working towards the laptop... man i wish my blogger hoodie would hurry up and get here, i ordered it about a week ago and they said it would be here in 70-10 days... we're working on day 9 now.. ill keep you posted. [c]

been meaning to write lately but where does all the time go? not much going on here lately except my anxious mind keeps wandering to thebroken website because it cant wait untill ep2 comes out.. i wish they would hurry up. how long does it take really? anyways... not much new in school, programming is going good [for the most part] i had to sneak my c++ book out of the classroom because he wants us to leave them by our monitors... dont really know why... but i plan on reading ahead a little and attempt to do a little 'advanced programming'. well i better go eat something, im hungry... [c]

Check out this book. It was written by the well renound [sp?] Kevin Mitnick. Its got tons of sweet stuff and thebroken reviewed it so it must be pretty good. Suppose to have 'Social Engineering' and stuff in it. Here is the URL if you want to check it out... courtesy of thinkgeek.com urlLink click here [c]

the oracle knows exactly what i am thinking... when i asked it what i should do this saturday giving it the options and it grading my abilites to answe questions. here were my choices: taking the psats, buying a laptop going to lan metro4, or sleeping in.... here was its reply to me.... The Oracle Advises... buying a new laptop urlLink Ask the Oracle a Question

any ideas on ways of making good money... i thought about sticking an old p2 266 mhz machine with 64 mb of ram and win 98 outstide of my firewall to install those little programs that have the toolbar so you can 'earn money while surfing'. now i know what your thinking. thats a bunch of crap right? well im going to try it anyways.. its not like i have anything to lose really when you think about it. and if it gets me an extra 30 bucks a month maybe its not that bad? lol still have about 1700 dollars to go on my laptop funding, which is the reason im asking your suggestions on money making opprotunities. if you have anything send me an im. ill post my info somwhere on the site

well... school was a complete drag today. it sucks when you miss a day and then have to make up all this work. ah well, i guess it wasnt that bad when you think about it... ill probably end up getting a defieciency because i didnt remember this stupid sililoquiy [er..something like that] from julius caesar. i truly think english is going to kill me. the one year i am doing fine in all my classes [except english of course]...bah, i hate english [Listening to: Softer To Me - Relient K - (03:23)]

I think i am getting the hang of this 'advanced coding' thing, see the links bar wasnt there so i had to emulate the archive post script in order to custom add my links to the new template. not bad for a n00b, eh? [Listening to: Cold Shot - Stevie Ray Vaughn and DT - Couldn't Stand the Weather (04:01)]
i think i got the add in working, it should show up at the bottom of the post. cross your fingers [Listening to: Dinosaurs Will Die - NOFX - Pump Up The Valium (03:01)]

trying out this new program called w.blogger got it at websttack.com. pretty sweet, includes all types of different add-ins for my blogger account. messing around with the media thing right now, i am listening to NOFX, Dinosaurs Will Die but the program wont seem to pick it out of winamp. wonder if i have to use windows media player, who knows, i will continue to screw around with it for a little while longer. **note.. turns out you have to have windows media player 9 with the blogging patch installed, so i am downloading that now. pretty soon you just might be able to see my true taste of music.

finally completed the family website, i would give you the url, but then i would have to kill you. you wouldnt like that now would you? finally ordered the blogger hoodie, cant wait until it gets here, hope its comfortable. also, i am deciding on whether or not to go skiing with the church or not, wouldnt mind going just dont think im up to paying a couple hundred of dollars... would rather put that towards my laptop, but who knows, maybe ill go maybe i wont.

thinking of investing in a nice compaq evo n610c. looks pretty nice, here are the specs for it. p4 2.0 ghz processor, 256 mb ram, 40 gig hd, cdrw/dvd combo drive, and xp pro. not a bad little set up. now i just have to get the money.. how shall i get money?
ah could the week be going by any slower?

Got back from the 'Saturday Night Coffee Haus' held monthly at my church urlLink RHCC . This 24 piece jazz band was fantastic. Most of the music they played was praise but they snuck some secular music in like, Glenn Miller's, In the Mood, which they have revamped it to 'The In Mood'. Anyways, you can check out their website urlLink Here . If you like swing music, I encourage you to try their CD. I bought one for myself. The price is a litte high though, at 15 dollars, but trust me it is well worth the money. For now, that is all.
I now have two cases for me ammo can pc. Next part is to get metal for the front panel. Hope it comes out half as good as this dudes did. urlLink Click here to check it out.

Aoccdrnig to a rscheearch dnoe at Cmabrigde Uinervtisy, it deosn't mttaer in waht oredr the ltteers in a wrod are, the olny iprmoetnt tihng is taht the frist and lsat ltteer be at the rghit pclae. The rset can be a total mses and you can sitll raed it wouthit porbelm.Tihs is bcuseae the huamn mnid deos not raed ervey lteter by istlef, but the wrod as a wlohe.

School is such a drag. BORING.... We do nothing but use our brains to do complex equations and write thirty page essays on the things no one really cares about... seriously, when are we going to use this stuff? LOL. As if that is not the question teachers get asked thirty times day. But think about it, if I were to become some master programmer.. Would I really need to know the history of some guy who pulled a sword out of a stone? Or Shakespeare's plays about insest and bloodshed.. But I can't wait until Max Payne 2 comes out... Only 14 days and counting, or something like that. Ah well, its off to church so I can play with the uber-expensive toys.

just got done watching the new broken video... i suppose it is just to hold us over until the actual v2.o comes out but obh well "hacking with ramzi" owned... i wish i had an extra 2o bucks so i can make one of those battering rams... heh, who knew that pvc, some handles and cement could bust thru an inch think sheetrock... [the bloopers at the end] and wasnt that little laugh that dude made after kevin chunked the battering ram through the wall... that was one of those scary laughters.... also, kevin was wearing that dolby hoodie again.. i emailed him about it about a week ago to see where he got it because i want one to go along side of my blogger one.. oh well... i think im going to fire up the old turbo c++ and listen to some rage against the machine... links are at the bottom. :) cheers [c] urlLink thebroken episode guide - [links for downloading v1.o and v1.5]

man havent written in a while, guess ive been too wrapped up in school and programming. not a good thing... been programming mainly websites, never can do to many of those. especially if you make good money off of them. couple hundred for an overnight project is not bad at all. my only source of income besides building computers and working for my dad's computer business. work has been slow for him, so im kind of hoping that he will get some business so we dont get into any problems or anything... on a brighter note, urlLink we had a lan party at school on friday . the third or fourth one for this year, it was good for the most part, until we had to get on the internet.... all me and a couple of friends wanted to do is just play wolfenstein enemy territory, but when armstrong found out he bout had a cow, or did he? he kicked worley out, and the rest of us guys left and went to mcdonalds, then back to worley's house to have our own lan party.... it was better than the one at school. mainly because we were allowed to use the internet to play the games, went good there, we played with d's urlLink clan, [kp] they're a pretty good group of guys... i was talking to them on ventrilo a voice chat program we use that runs in the background that lets us all talk to each other over the internet. [with pretty much no lag at all].... woke up the next morning and went to be urlLink blue man group concert which was one of the best experiences of my life. i totally reccommend it if you ever get the chance to go.... the "appetizers" as they called it [i refer to them as the people who arent as good as the other people so they have to open for somebody else] werent very good, but the intermission before blue man was awesome... i expected it to be lame but they had two of those little scrolling word signs that were arguing with each other and getting the audience to interact with them.. pretty cool, because it made the 15 min intermission go by really fast... i like that.... why cant all places do that, put out something that will entertain you while you are waiting to be entertained by the main group?? anyways thats off subject... back to the concert... who would of thought 3 dudes in blue paint banging on pvc would be an awesome musical group... not to mention the 5 drummers, 3 guitarist and the rest of the guys who plays with them... all in all the concert was good, and i really enjoy the music, my dad bought the cd and i have been listening to it non stop... partially because its an all out good cd... i totally recomend it, like i said above, i think.. dont remember, i think this is my longes ever blog... ill quit boring you now and go back to my cd, ah man i forgot i got to do laundry, oh well got to go for now but i will try and post every once an a while... [hopefully better than i have been] until next time... adios [c]
nothing new here, just started a new tri at school and i am currently working on a secret prog to be very devious at school. it shoul be great. cant wait until im done with it. [c]

well i have finally finished it, i just added a whole new register db to the boswell lan club website. took me about two hours to perfect it but when i did, it worked great... check out urlLink my work here

man i got to write a program with stupid dice which will be graded in about 20 minutes.... i dont think ill do it and just move on to the next assignment. ah well... when i get home i need to reformat my hard drive and reinstall winxp pro... i attempted to try and play with server2003 small business 14 day trial but i got bored with it and some of my programs dont work with it.. i took it to a lan party and and it acted so ghey it wasnt even funny, guess they still have to work out the bugs in it. anyways i dont think that i am going to get this program to work in time so ill just not turn it in. this is getting to be quite a drag and i have to hide the blogger window from the coach while he is making his rounds... its really small and the kid next to me keeps asking what i am doing and i have to hide it from him to because he wil probably tell the teacher, i know him.. hes a goody goody, anyways i have to start another prog now. i will write when i get home later [c]

taking a break from all the gaming... pretty nice. got me server here next to the laptop. running all sorts of apps for our gaming experiences. nick crashed already, and i think worley is fixing to hit the sack also. or at least he is laying down on his bed. probably going to sleep... yeah im a little tired, and i will probabaly be going to bed soon too... as soon as i can find a place to crash, its not like the lan things where you just pick up a piece of floor next to a window and use the curtain as your blanket, but then again what do i know. ah well im tired of typing, and this music that is on the game D is playing is driving me nuts. [c]

well folks the new year is almost here. and i cant wait. havent been doing much lately. just got done watching the movie S.W.A.T. and that movie is off the hook. action packed thriller or something like that. anyways im just sitting here listening to my music at very loud volumes and i think my left ear is going deaf from the other day when i was at the shooting range unloading a couple clips from the old glock... ah that thing is sweet... i got to go and find somethine else to do... i might check ebay for some weapons or something
just got done ordering a nice 10" mixer with a crossfader for my dj'ing... i got it for half off from an online distributor... so its all good. i cant wait until i get it.
got me a nice new 6.1 surround sound system... i am currently running it with my klh receiver but when i get another 300 dollars i am going to get a new onkyo receiver... schweet :P
excellent!
working on a webcam for a feed... check above the links... thats where it should be when i am done

just won a truck in an auction.. a red 2001 ford ranger, its pretty nice.. there was a reserve on it so i have to talk to the dealership about a final price. in the meantime you can check it out here.. wish me luck. i hope i get it. urlLink here is the link for the autotrader site... be sure to check out the name of the highest bidder... ;)

anyone want to donate to me.. i need about 2 grand for my truck... not to mention the 1300 dollar stereo system i want to put in... you see the little donate button there to the left.. go on and click it, and while your there, donate with your favorite credit card.

oh man am i enjoying this no school thing... i woke up about noon this morning to find breakfast made for me and then i have now just been chillin watching techtv... this is the life... i think i have found a new career.. "professional slacker". as long as the job description says "lazy person who sits around a watches tv/plays video games/surfs the internet/blogs on blogger" im up for the job.
anyone want to donate to a worthy cause? the help chris get a truck fund i think it is... blog on. \m/('_')\m/ [c]

just got back from the lan at chance's house... pretty good... there was only 3 of us there so we ended up messing with sub7 and overclocking with this proggy we saw on tss.... good stuff... chances comp is an athlon xp 2500 i think and its only running at 1.4 ghz lol.... anyways... i left my max payne cd and my pcmcia nick over there so chance is bringing them over because i accidentally walked away with a bf1942 cd.. we are going to make the Xchange. anyways... i need to go and take a shower.. blog on. \m/('_')\m/ [c]

takes me back to the memories when everyone used to listen to alice cooper... with the infamous schools out for summer... well close enought... got out of school today and dont have to go back until after the new year... can you believe it? its so great.. now i get to sleep in and everything... except tomorrow, i am being forced to go to mineola.... if you dont know where that is neither do i. dont want to explain it.... i dont even think that it is on the map... seriously... well in a bit i am going to fire up the old 386 and play some games in win3.1... ah the good old days when you had a 386 you were something... lol... oh well... maybe might even bring up linux so i can try and get my webserver up and running... wont that come in handy at school.... accessing all me files... good stuff blog on. [c]

ah yes... my favoritest class of all time. programming.... the guys in there are so hilarious and we do everything to get on army's nervers... heh, gotta love it. cant wait until after the break, and if you sit on the back row in class then youll know why, lol.... rick and kris at least do. blog on. [c]

here are my current electronic iitems up for sale. nokia 6590 cell phone [everything included except SIM card] $75.00 [i payed 150 for it, and it was used for 2 wks.] intel peronal audio player 3000 [everything except headphones] $80.00 [payed 180] dell latitude xpi // 133mhz // 16mb ram // win95 $100.00 [w. charger and case] handspring visor deluxe [running palm os, w/ software and usb docking cradle] $70.00 [paid 100.00] bout it. for now.. will add if i find anything else... if you would like to know more about the following items, just find a way to contact me... all my info is on the under contact... happy blogging,. chris

i think i am going to make the final switch soon... been running this system for a couple of days now, and i am fairly impressed. however my blog looks so much different on linux than it does on windows... i wonder why? looks better a crisp on the linux box and the gfx on the site are there, however they dont show up on the winxp box.. oh well i guess i neede to put up a little note that says "best viewed with linux" or maybe "this page best viewed with mozilla." oh well... ill go ahead and make something up.... happing blogging... [c]

i never realized the beauty of linux until i just installed it. im running it right now on an old 12 gig wd hard drive i had lying around and to tell you the truth, ::whispers:: i want to install this as my primary operating system:: seriously... it has everything already on here like irc and aim and all the good stuff, even progs so i can do my c++ programming without using freeware progs i downloaded off the internet... seriously im going to play some more with this and ill let you know my decision... [c]

so, spent a little time with the graphics and then i came up with this... urlLink behold. the boswell lan club store get your gear here, some of the wwad stuff is a programming thing so if you dont understand it, dont worry.

ever wonder exactly what i do in my spare time? here is a short list of the websites i surf on a daily basis... who knows you might find yourself checking one out too... urlLink thebroken urlLink the screen savers urlLink google urlLink blogger urlLink auto trader urlLink ebay urlLink cdw urlLink boswell lan club urlLink does your room suck? urlLink lan party dot com urlLink file planet urlLink ausgamers urlLink linux iso urlLink tucows [c]

sure has been a long time since i last blogged. been real busy and done a lot since, finished the ammo can pc. then i destroyed it, because i couldnt get my comp to boot. got it fixed by taking the bios batt out. works fine. im really getting in to my programming, i have to start practicing for urlLink bpa in january. cant wait.. if i go to state, i get a letter jacket, so its all good. still need to brush up on my skills. armstrong says ill be doing header files, and frankly i hate header files... i would much rather be writing the main file. crazy teacher, oh well; ill get over it. my dad says i have to clean my room, which might i add is not fun becuase i have let it get way to dirty since the last time i cleaned. so i guess im going to clean.. and maybe ill be better this time on updating [c]
got my nokia 3650 today at about noon.. and im loving it
this is the phone i might be getting... i have given up on the sony ericsson t616... this one has an internal mem card for all the pics i take. so im happy :) urlLink nokia 3650

ah the weekend... 2 days of doing nothing.. got to love it... oh yeah check out this movie.. you gots to have flash player though.... and if you dont get it, dont worry, its a programming thing.... urlLink army and his smoker.

so i called the attws store before i went to see if the phone was in stock... and they said it was... so i get to the store about 6:05 and i had to wait 40 minutes to be helped... then guess what?!?!? they were out of stock... they told me that they had been since christmas... now correct me if im wrong.. but i just called the place 30 minutes before that and they told me they had it.... whats up with that
i cant wait.. in just a bit i will be getting my sony ericsson t616... then i will be updating my urlLink moblog frequently throughout the day... wish me luck
decided i would change the template of the blog back for those users who are not using mozilla ;)

soon i will have a moblog up so that you can see the stuff that goes on throughout my day. if you dont know what a moblog is, its when you have a device with a camera and you upload the images to the internet.. i have already created my textamerica account and now i just have to get my camera-phone. i went to the att store today to pick up the sony ericsson t616 but they were out, and they expect them to be in on wednesday. so guess what i am doing wednesday? i am going by the att store on my way to church so i might even have a pic up for you that night of my sound board that i get to play with at church.. all depending on whether or not i have enough battery to send a pic. i hope so though :)
i dont want to go back to school on monday.. this totally blows... oh well. at least the mischevious group in the programming class will live again!!.. muahahaha, freaking you out? me too...

this year is going by so slowly... it seems like every day just gets longer and longer. i think that i have reached the end of the internet because i am running out of places to surf too. what does this mean? i thought the internet was bigger than this

Clean Clean DocumentEmail false false false MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 /* Style Definitions */ table.MsoNormalTable {mso-style-name:"Table Normal"; mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0; mso-tstyle-colband-size:0; mso-style-noshow:yes; mso-style-parent:""; mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-para-margin:0in; mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt; mso-pagination:widow-orphan; font-size:10.0pt; font-family:"Times New Roman"; mso-ansi-language:#0400; mso-fareast-language:#0400; mso-bidi-language:#0400;} Memorial day weekend was a great weekend for camping, we went to loyd park, on joe pool lake Friday afternoon and got back around 12 today. Lots of fishing even though the fish weren’t biting very much, I caught 2 and some of the others caught a couple. All in all was a good trip Went to circuit city this afternoon and got a new stereo receiver, sold mine to my dad because he wanted 5.1 in the living room and it wasn’t doing me to much good with a 6.1 speaker set. So I went out and was looking at the onkyo txsr502, about 300 dollars, and I decided to get the txsr501 for 249 so I saved a little money. Just got it hooked up and it is friggin awesome sound. I love it, must go play chris

Clean Clean DocumentEmail false false false MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 /* Style Definitions */ table.MsoNormalTable {mso-style-name:"Table Normal"; mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0; mso-tstyle-colband-size:0; mso-style-noshow:yes; mso-style-parent:""; mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-para-margin:0in; mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt; mso-pagination:widow-orphan; font-size:10.0pt; font-family:"Times New Roman"; mso-ansi-language:#0400; mso-fareast-language:#0400; mso-bidi-language:#0400;} Lately I have been interested in getting my cell to control my pc over Bluetooth, and after several failed programs I finally found one. “Bemused” pretty nice application controls Winamp, windows media player, and PowerPoint, pretty nice for all being rolled into one package. Today I took the laptop to school, threw it in a bag with some headphones and controlled my music all day from my phone. it owns. I think I’m going to go and play with this some more. Chris

just registered urlLink chrishillis.us , could take anywhere up to 24 hours to point the domain name here. also giving the template a little face lift. hope you like chris Watching: Extreme Makeover: Home Edition

Surfing the internet for crap, came across this site where people can post their songs they have written to allow other people to read it, and I have to say I am impressed. I wish I could write as good as some of the folks out there. I was just thinking to myself how cool it would be to write a song and actually have it recorded with music and everything. I personally don't care if it gets anywhere, just a dream I've always had. School was good today, didn't really do anything to speak of, but watch a couple of movies. Just over a week until we get out of school. I believe it is 8 days or something like that. This year has really gone by so fast. Next year I'll be a junior, oh what fun that will be. I think I'm going to get me something to eat. chris Listening To: 99 Steps Closer - Linkin Park feat. Jay Z

Clean Clean DocumentEmail false false false MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 /* Style Definitions */ table.MsoNormalTable {mso-style-name:"Table Normal"; mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0; mso-tstyle-colband-size:0; mso-style-noshow:yes; mso-style-parent:""; mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-para-margin:0in; mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt; mso-pagination:widow-orphan; font-size:10.0pt; font-family:"Times New Roman"; mso-ansi-language:#0400; mso-fareast-language:#0400; mso-bidi-language:#0400;} School was great today, we had a meeting this morning after announcements for the pc repair class me and a bunch of friends are taking next year. Pretty basic stuff, just getting an a+ cert. I had to present my espanol project today, and since me and Worley made ours über -bad, (flash, video editing) we made a 110, and also got to miss 5 th period to show our presentation to the Spanish dept and some of the administrators. Pretty soon ill be off to church to play with the toys ( not really toys, just what I like to call really expensive equipment that I will never own… oOoOo …) -chris

i thought id never come back to blog again, but something changed my mind. Im not sure what it was but i just wanted to get back into the blogging scene. im going to see about being able to post from my phone somehow... maybe by sending an email.. im not sure. because my urlLink moblog receives pics i attach in an email and post them so i am almost sure this will be quite easy. ill keep you posted. [c]

i dont know how many people read my blog, but i am going to post this anyway. generous people are the coolest people in the world. therefore if there is anyone lucky enough do have a gmail account and 1 extra invite, i would be forever greatful to the person who is willing to invite me. my email addy is // chris at urtechnet dot com // you can put that together cant you? thanks chris

the trip to ruidoso was awesome. we had the greatest host parents in the world. they cooked us steaks and let us take the car whereever we wanted to go. there were six of us that had their whole downstairs. me, phil, adam, rosier, brady and landon. we had 3 bedrooms 3 bathrooms and a closet that had a closet on it. the bathroom upstairs had a urinal in it which is the coolest thing ever, i think. and the kids at vbs were awesome. i had dinner at the outback steakhouse with my prayer partner that i didnt even know before, and we revealed who our prayer partners were afterwards. my prayer partner was courtney fikes, she is really cool and hopefully i will get to know here more. thats it for now. peace chris
yo peace chris
This sleeping till noon thing friggin ownz. Not much to say but….. 3 days peace chris

so there is definitely only 5 days till im out of here for a while. ruidosa here i come....again..... yeah thats it. spent 4-6:30 at the church with my group working out some of the fine details for our vbs group. oh yeah, papercuts suck, anyways... rubber cement is fun. and thats all i got. peace chris
urlLink check it out .... arent they beauts? too bad they are out of me price range.... :( Chris

soon, yes, soon, spent a couple hours up at the church today printing out all of our vbs stuff, they have a nice printer, color laser. i want one. oh well you cant always get what you want. i am sitting here watching cops, you can tell how bored i am, fun stuff. i am fixing to reformat my computer so i can reinstall windows on a bigger hard drive and then i will be able to use one of my 40s for 2003 server, so i can get a video stream going, it ought to be nice. also i will be getting an email server up so ill have my own @chrishillis.us email address. right now the domain is just pointed to blogger, so no server to have my own emails. chris

well, what is there to do, just got done mowing the lawn and i am tired. weedeating is the worst part, and my brother left me alone to do it all alone. tonight we are going to the races somewhere, not sure where, i think my mom said boyd. whereever that is. it ought to be fun, hopefully. i am going upstairs to listen to sat radio. chris

Clean Clean DocumentEmail false false false MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 /* Style Definitions */ table.MsoNormalTable {mso-style-name:"Table Normal"; mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0; mso-tstyle-colband-size:0; mso-style-noshow:yes; mso-style-parent:""; mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-para-margin:0in; mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt; mso-pagination:widow-orphan; font-size:10.0pt; font-family:"Times New Roman"; mso-ansi-language:#0400; mso-fareast-language:#0400; mso-bidi-language:#0400;} Pretty nice weather we are having outside, huh? Two nights of severe weather, got to love it. The part I really like about it is getting to listen to the Tarrant County RACES. They always have interesting stuff on there. If you have a scanner the frequency is 146.9400. Its only good talking when there is severe weather going on. Last night was pretty good, hail and everything, but tonight, church got cut short. Hatchett stormed in towards the end of class, and told me to give him some power to his microphone, got up to the front of the room and said the sirens were going off in Richland Hills [which is where the church is]. So we either had the choice to stay in the HS room, because that’s on of the storm shelters in the church, or we could leave. Since I was riding with Phillip, we left and stopped by the Diamond Shamrock, on the way to his house to get some a 79 cent 32oz coke. When we got back to his house we sat in his room for about 20 minutes looking at the radar and then decided to go the City of Lake worth PD because the night before Phil was there with Joey until about 3 o’clock. We sat up there in the dispatch and not much was going on, so we got Joey’s scanner out of his office, and since the power was out, and they were on generators there was no power in Joey’s office, so we took the scanner to the computer room, bad idea, the room is like made out of bricks, so we didn’t get any signal, we decided to go and get an extension cord to set by the window where we got to listen to all the good stuff going on RACES. Once the storm passed over we headed back to Phil’s and here I am no back at home, tired, and fixing to go to bed. Chris

from the (g4)techtv messageboards [bah I hate saying g4, its so stupid. lets have the tally: Martin Sargent: Appears to be going to G4techtv. Cat: CONFIRMED to go to G4techtv. Don't know what show. Roger: 90% sure to go to G4techtv. Don't know what show. Adam/Morgan: VERY likely to continue X-Play on G4techtv. Kevin/Sarah: "On the fence" with word "coming soon." It appears they were offered positions and are deciding if they should accept. I assume they would be on TSS still. Pat Norton: NOT GOING TO G4TECHTV when TSS moves on July 2nd. It's over. :-( Leo Laporte: No negotiations on going. It appears he will continue doing 2 minute TSS segements from home for now. Things could change but they don't look good. Jessica Corbin: No word. Chris Leery: Appears out of the network. Yoshi: Told a TSS audience he is likely not going to G4techtv. Dan "Foo" and others: Who knows? Very sad. Leo and Pat are the network. Now neither will really be on it soon I don’t know what I am going to do without half the cast of TSS. Comcast has defnitely kille the tech in the channel. Now its all lame gaming [not even fps but rpg and mario kart?] I think im going to crawl into a hole and cry chris Listening To: For Those About To Rock - AC/DC

No school. I love it. I get to sit here each and every day and surf the net without listening to nagging teachers… its great. chris

working up at the theatrizzie is off the hizzie, i love it. i am going to see i, robot tonight at star village with phil, hes getting me in fer free, on account of he works there. its gonna be great peace chris
anyone want to go to the projekt revolution tour when it comes to dallas? only 53 per ticket. i want to go but not alone. let me know chris

i got my gmail account! my new addy is chris[dot]hillis[at]gmail[dot]com so send me an email some time. as soon as I get some invitations to send out I will be giving them away so if you want in, send me an email saying so. thats all for now peace chris

well, quakecon is around the corner, 3 days to be exact, and i cant wait. games, free stuff, and more games. and bawls lots of em. today i am going to go and try to get a gfx card because i am in need of one and then ill be ready hopefully. worley is having a lan at his house on wed night, ill prob go over there just wont set anything up because i dont want to have to tear it down early in the morning for the drive over to grapevine. all i got for now. peace chris

yo yo yo, finally, we stopped working on the theater today, and the green room is well. green. xbox green to be exact. it looks awesome. I sort of cant wait until school starts. some of my classes will be awesome while the others will suck. heres my schedule. intro to computer maint - armstrong [this class is going to be awesome] us hist a - meeks eng 3a - calkins [never heard of 'em] span 2a - newcomb [same class as my little bro] tech theater - wilson [fun stuff] this year wilson wants me to do video stuff for R&J [our fall show] which will be awesome. Hargrove [sp?] and Wilson have some really extreme ideas and i think the show will rock. then in the beginning of 2005 we get to do Godspell. which we are going to turn into this killer rock show that will have lighting out the wazoo, and a band on stage. i cant wait for that also. the intro to comp maint. is going to be awesome because army will be teaching us the computer stuff [a lot of it i already know, i am just taking the class because the school district is going to pay for me to get my a+ certification which will look really good on your resume when you go to apply for a job that involves you working with a computer.] most of our lessons will be online, but its all good. anyways. thats all i have for now, right now i am rocking out to "by myself - linkin park" good song. i will update you with some more useless information later. peace chris
